name: Edna
description:
Made in 5 Days for the November Noir Game Jam

Edna is a crime drama adventure game with horror elements. 

Detectives Amos and Clark must uncover the mystery surrounding the death of a woman that no one seems to know. 

  • An average of 30 minutes of playtime.
  • Multiple endings.
  • Minimalistic pixel-art style.
  • 100% hand drawn original art assets.
  • Interactive storytelling.

Controls

ADRMBPan leftPan rightInteract PATCH NOTES:
  • Fixed an issue with the GUI text not displaying properly.
  • Fixed an issue that prevents the player from arresting someone at the end if you return to the beach.
